page.title: 10A PUBLIC HOUSE IN S.CROYDON
page.content: The Earl Of Eldon{pub}was built in 1865.It is owned by Charringtons brewery,who employ a manager and 5 staff.It is one of many pubs in S.Croydon,and has the advantage of being on the busy Brighton Rd.In contrast, the Parish of Sanderstead is "dry",having no pubs at all. Most people use this pub as a place where they can{socialise}with friends. The{entertainment}offered consists of light background music,two fruit machines and a dart board.Part of the newly built car park is used as a beer garden.The{opening times}are Mon._Sat. 11_3p.m. and 5.30_11p.m.Sunday times are slightly shorter.The pub has its own football team consisting of some of the reulars.
